programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and D'arcy travel to an unexpected place to recover an alien device left behind by his people.

Athena and the 118 respond to bizarre emergency calls on Halloween, including a flock of crows terrorizing a field trip, an office employee having a close encounter with an eight-limbed creature and a ghost-like girl wandering a neighborhood.
When a murder weapon from a case close to Athena in the early '90s resurfaces, flashbacks to 1989 show how Athena joined the LAPD and became the police officer she is today.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and D'arcy travel to an unexpected place to recover an alien device left behind by his people.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When Ohio mother Heather Bogle goes missing, a detective identifies multiple suspects, until he himself comes under scrutiny for his investigation.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The investigation into the death of a woman whose remains were found in her Frisco, Texas, garage leads detectives to a series of suspects with connections to the victim's complicated and secretive life.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The investigation into the death of a woman whose remains were found in her Frisco, Texas, garage leads detectives to a series of suspects with connections to the victim's complicated and secretive life.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 bands together to fight a raging fire on the 20th floor of the residential high-rise where Jay and Will Halstead's father lives and has gone missing; in the midst of the chaos, Brett learns unsettling information about her new partner.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide investigates a victim's motives after rescuing him and his child from a car accident; Boden clashes with Gorsch over appointing a new lieutenant; Mouch reaches out to a fellow firefighter; Cruz discovers he has a new admirer.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Herrmann faces hazing in his new role as lieutenant; Foster suspects a young gymnast's injury is more than meets the eye; Severide is jealous of Kidd's best friend; Casey and Boden turn to P.D. after treating two victims who have similar injuries.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Foster faces blowback after pointing out a doctor's oversight; Brett helps Casey look for a new apartment; Kidd prepares Tuesday the Dalmatian for the Fire Safety Dog Competition; a serious accusation is leveled against Severide.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey struggles to get Boden to sign off on an energetic new recruit; Foster extends an olive branch to her irritating new medic; Otis inspires Herrmann to seek new partners at Molly's; Brett realizes life in Fowlerton will take some getting used to.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Tension builds when a group of rabble-rousers attempts to lock down the firehouse; Brett is faced with a monumental decision; Cruz readies himself for a big day; Gallo and Ritter attempt to launch Firehouse 51 into the social media age.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of false alarms at a private school hinders 51's ability to respond to legitimate emergencies; Kidd asks for ideas to surprise Severide on his birthday; Cruz and Brett rent out their extra room but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Brett and Mackey find their lives in peril; Casey and Brett tread in unfamiliar territory; Severide chases a memory while Kidd adeptly solves a firehouse problem; Ritter puts himself in harm's way during a harrowing call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A fire at a homeless encampment leaves Severide and Casey searching for answers; Cruz is shaken up after a close call; Ritter lends a helping hand to a victim.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Casey try to find the best fit for Kidd; Ritter, Gallo and Violet help plan an event for Mouch.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 deals with the aftermath of the capsized boat rescue; Gallo, Ritter and Violet discuss plans for a side gig.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Griffin learns the truth about his father's death and reveals why he really came to visit Casey; Gallo, Ritter and Violet take steps to expand their microbrewery business.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kidd spreads her wings as a lieutenant; Chief Hawkins rides with Ambulance 61 to learn more about Brett; Casey takes a trip out of town; a Ritter date night turns into an emergency situation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey makes a life-altering decision; Gallo, Ritter and Violet agree to an interview and photo shoot; Brett and Mouch launch the paramedicine program; Cruz comes closer to fatherhood.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A major security breach in the city's computer networks forces Firehouse 51's senior leaders to take matters into their own hands; Severide gears up for an arson investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Gallo clashes with the new lieutenant temporarily filling in for Casey; Severide closes in on a dangerous and deadly arsonist.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Gallo, Violet and Ritter debut their microbrewery business at Winterfest; Brett prepares to present her paramedicine program to an oversight panel; Firehouse 51 gets in the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Stella Kidd returns to Firehouse 51; the team must work together to put out a potassium fire in a tunnel; after that incident, Ritter begins to worry about a young cop who witnessed the fiery death of a truck driver.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Kidd investigate an explosion at a jewelry store; Cruz and Chloe take steps to make Javi a permanent part of their family; Gallo, Ritter and Mouch try to bond with Carver.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide goes for an unexpected ride on Truck 81; Ritter's worlds collide when his secret cop boyfriend helps 51 track down Severide and the missing rig.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Sgt. Olivia Benson attempts to thwart a violent home invasion, she gets more than she bargains for and becomes a hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Erin Lindsay and Antonio Dawson from Chicago P.D. help SVU when two convicted murderers escape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU begins investigating members of a top youth hockey team after a savage hazing takes place in a locker room.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and D'arcy travel to an unexpected place to recover an alien device left behind by his people.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives investigate after a school nurse notices multiple injuries on a young girl; Detective Amaro tries to bond with his recently discovered son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The state pursues a media-sensationalized case against a known pedophile who's suspected of assaulting and killing a youth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young gymnast is found murdered, Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate both her demanding coach and a wealthy benefactor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have the gruesome task of identifying the remains of a man and woman who were stabbed in a park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives track down two junior-high students in connection with the rape and murder of a cancer patient who's been growing marijuana in her apartment.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of an outspoken critic becomes the prime suspect when the star of a controversial teen show is raped in her trailer on the set.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gang member is pushed from a rooftop in what appears to be retribution for a sexual assault, but when the assault victim also turns up dead, the detectives realize the case is far more complicated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother who reported the statutory rape of her daughter is found murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal beating of a 12-year-old boy uncovers a female suspect whose trial becomes about the rights of same-sex parents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage boy is killed in what appears to be a play fight, the victim's friend claims he filmed the death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman finds a teenage boy sleeping naked in her bedroom, detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the teen and his mother to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pregnant 13-year-old won't identify the father of her baby, Benson and the squad try to determine if she was raped; after the investigation uncovers a secret, someone goes missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three young girls' search for a mythical character leads to one of them becoming injured and the other two disappearing.

programme.title: Live: PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: The third round of the Travelers Championship gets underway from Cromwell, Conn. TPC River Highlands is the second-shortest course featured on the 2025 PGA Tour schedule, with the par-70 track playing just 6,844 yards and sporting only two par fives.

programme.title: Live: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Blue Bombers (1-0) and Lions (1-1) end a home-and-home set with the second leg from BC Place. Five-time defending West champion Winnipeg began its season with a 34-20 decision over BC in Week 2, with Chris Streveler tossing three TD passes.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: NASCAR Cup Series drivers return stateside for the Great American Getaway 400. Shane van Gisbergen dominated the inaugural Cup Series race in Mexico for his second series victory. Denny Hamlin seeks his fourth win at this event since 2019.
